初遇.encontent:
I'm Door, an insignificant piece of a mirror. By nature
 I'm of no difference to my other 3587 siblings; but
 knowing you has made me different to them.
初遇.content:
我是门，一片微不足道的碎片，来自一块镜面。从本质上
来说，我与我其他三千五百八十七片兄弟姐妹们并无区别
，而与你相识，使我同他们不再相同。

箱中气候.encontent:
Today is gloomy and somber enough as it is, don't let
 the cloud hang over you. Take a look at this, it may
 cheer you up.
箱中气候.content:
阴郁、沉闷，但也别被乌云遮了心。瞧瞧这个，你会感到
好一些的。

致未来.encontent:
When the mirror was shattered, I broke off and lay scattered
 at where I am now. I shall travel through days and nights to
 seek the truth, to return to where I was born. Oh, wait. There
 is no such era of truth. That's right. No era is true ...
致未来.content:
我破碎，我散落在我所在的地方。我将穿越日夜寻求真实
，回到我出生的地方。噢，不对。不存在真实的时代，没
错，不存在真实的时代……

孑立.encontent:
Em ... no one is here. Standing still, eyes on the
 target, start spinning ... Ahem, "the dart is going
 straight onto the bull's-eye!"
孑立.content:
嗯……确定无人。站直身姿，瞄准方向，开始旋转……咳
咳，“飞镖正向十环进发！”

问候.encontent:
Hello, curious explorer. I hope what reflects in the
 mirror would bring you joy.
问候.content: 你好，好奇的探索者。希望镜中的倒影能令你喜悦。

朝晨.encontent:
Morning used to be the time when I had to keep a low profile.
 Spoke no words and took no actions, just to be good at being
 a mirror. But now, I'm merely a fragment of what I used to be.
 You see, I was lucky to be freed from the life-long duty to
 reflect others' images.
朝晨.content:
清晨应当是我最低调的时刻。我得沉默，安静，就像是一
面镜子，做好一面镜子——而现在，我只是一块儿碎片。你
看，我很幸运，得以从映照他人的时刻中解脱出来。

信任-朝晨.encontent:
The tides coming to the shore, Carbuncles in the woods opening
 their sleepy eyes, or the first light of morning shedding on
 a city avenue ... Which one of the sceneries better brightens
 your mood while you enjoy your breakfast?
信任-朝晨.content:
海潮爬上沙滩、森林里的卡邦克鲁开始苏醒、曙光洒落大
道……哪个镜中画面，能更好地愉悦你享用早餐的心情？

夜暮.encontent:
A floating UFO lamp, a radio unwilling to talk, a wooden horse
 comes from a great bloodline ... they are all real, living on
 the other side of the mirror, at somewhere under this sky. They
 are so lively, so honest and benign.
夜暮.content:
飘浮的UFO台灯，沉默寡言的收音机，继承伟大血统的
木马……这些都是真实存在的。在某一侧，某一处。他们
如此雀跃，如此温实。

信任-夜暮.encontent:
Try ending your long day with a milk bath and clearing
 your mind in the tub. I promise, you will wake up
 feeling in top form in the next day.
信任-夜暮.content:
试试卸下一天的重担，泡个舒畅的牛奶浴，脑袋空空。我
保证，到了明天，肯定什么都难不住你。

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
I can feel your eyes. Now, if you give off a smile,
 you'd find yourself being smiled at too.
帽檐与发鬓.content:
我察觉到你在注视着我，如果此时，你尝试展露笑容，我
也会同你展露笑容。

袖与手.encontent:
Oh, please be very, very careful. I don't wish to see
 more of the unnecessary bloodshed on any scale.
袖与手.content:
噢，请十分小心、小心，我不希望再有人因我而无谓地流
血。

衣着与身形.encontent:
While you gaze your reflection in me, I gaze back and
 see my own reflection in your eyes.
衣着与身形.content: 你将在我的镜中看见你，而我也将在你的眼中瞧见我。

嗜好.encontent:
All these frames in the world! Although they don't
 belong to me, I'm deeply enchanted by their caring
 nature, or say, their carrying nature.
嗜好.content:
世界上所有的框！虽然它们不为我所拥有，但仅是这种承
载我们的存在，就深深迷住了我。

赞赏.encontent:
"Mirror, mirror, who is the most exceptional one of all?" "Oh,
 this person is, right before me. Behold, the reflection of the
 embodiment of virtues and manners."
赞赏.content:
“魔镜、魔镜，世界上最优秀的家伙在哪？”“噢，就在
我面前。看吧，我正映照出优秀的品行与端正的姿态。”

亲昵.encontent:
It's my pleasure to reflect your look day and night,
 when you are resting and working. The companionship
 goes both ways.
亲昵.content:
我很乐意映照你的面容，不管是休息时，还是认真工作时
。这既是为了你，也是为了我自己。

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
Sorry to bother you with this, but please attach this piece of
 note to my back. Yes—it says "no entry." I have to find a way
 to stop those fanatics from getting passed through me to that
 "world in the mirror."
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
麻烦你，请将这张纸条贴在我背上。是的——是“此路不
通”。我必须想些办法制止那些企图进入镜中世界的人，他
们太疯狂了……

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
Yes, please decorate me with the things you like. I think I can
 handle different colors, glittering ribbons, or some scorchingly
 warm lightbulbs. Having them around me would smooth my sharp
 edges and thaw my coldness, and give me a touch of warmth and
 festivity.
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
是的，以你喜欢的任何方式装点我。我想我能够适应许多
色彩、闪亮的飘带或灼热的灯泡。在它们的衬托下，我不
再锋利冰冷，而是充满了温馨与节日的气息。

独白.encontent:
A sophisticated mirror would know what can be reflected
 and what cannot.
独白.content: 一面成熟的镜子，应该知道能倒映什么，不能倒映什么。

入队.content: 噢，难不成……对手是气球吗？

战前.encontent: My enemy is fighting their enemy's enemy.
战前.content: 敌人的敌人，正是镜中的敌人。

择选高阶咒语.encontent: This is poetic, don't you think?

择选至终的仪式.encontent: Wholeness is only a matter on the surface.

战斗胜利.encontent:
They have witnessed their failure with their own eyes
 ... though it was too cruel to be my intention.
战斗胜利.content: 他们“亲眼”见证了自己的失败……这并非我的本意。

洞悉.encontent:
The view in the mirror has become the reality ... or
 it seems that way.
洞悉.content: 镜中景象正成为现实……或许如此。
